body_html:
I wasn't able to work with that configuration on other libraries like caffe either.
(On this config, I successfully installed and tested caffe and theano)
Now my system details are:
OS: ubuntu 16.04
gpu: nvidia 940mx
cuda : 8.0rc
cudnn: 5.1

I am having this error:

ERROR: /home/cortana/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:2184:1: no such target '//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite': target 'android_tensorflow_lib_lite' not declared in package 'tensorflow/core' defined by /home/cortana/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD and referenced by '//tensorflow/core/kernels:android_tensorflow_kernels'.
ERROR: /home/cortana/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:2184:1: no such target '//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite': target 'android_tensorflow_lib_lite' not declared in package 'tensorflow/core' defined by /home/cortana/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD and referenced by '//tensorflow/core/kernels:android_tensorflow_kernels'.
ERROR: Evaluation of query "deps((//... union @bazel_tools//tools/jdk:toolchain))" failed: errors were encountered while computing transitive closure.
Configuration finished

In order to remove these errors, I tried commenting out if_android, if_ios from tensorflow/core/BUILD but that hasnt helped.

Now my system details are:

In order to remove these errors, I tried commenting out if_android, if_ios from tensorflow/core/BUILD but that hasnt helped.
body:
I wasn't able to work with that configuration on other libraries like caffe either. 
(On this config, I successfully installed and tested caffe and theano)
Now my system details are:
OS: ubuntu 16.04
gpu: nvidia 940mx
cuda : 8.0rc
cudnn: 5.1

I am having this error: 

```
ERROR: /home/cortana/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:2184:1: no such target '//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite': target 'android_tensorflow_lib_lite' not declared in package 'tensorflow/core' defined by /home/cortana/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD and referenced by '//tensorflow/core/kernels:android_tensorflow_kernels'.
ERROR: /home/cortana/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:2184:1: no such target '//tensorflow/core:android_tensorflow_lib_lite': target 'android_tensorflow_lib_lite' not declared in package 'tensorflow/core' defined by /home/cortana/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD and referenced by '//tensorflow/core/kernels:android_tensorflow_kernels'.
ERROR: Evaluation of query "deps((//... union @bazel_tools//tools/jdk:toolchain))" failed: errors were encountered while computing transitive closure.
Configuration finished

```

In order to remove these errors, I tried commenting out if_android, if_ios from tensorflow/core/BUILD but that hasnt helped.
